title: David Thompson: The Melodic Guardian

story.text: David Thompson, a 53-year-old singing coach, discovered a mysterious glowing amulet in the back room of his studio. It hummed softly when he sang near it, sparking his curiosity.
Testing the amulet’s powers, David sang a high C and accidentally shattered a glass across the room. Amazed, he realized that the amulet amplified his voice into a sonic force.
During a coaching session, David overheard a commotion outside. A robbery was taking place. Without thinking, he sang a powerful note, disorienting the criminals until the police arrived.
Media caught wind of the event, dubbing the unknown hero 'The Melodic Guardian'. Emboldened, David decided to use his new powers for good, but kept his identity a secret.
David spent the day mastering his vocal powers, learning to adjust pitch and volume for various effects, from a soothing lullaby to a deafening roar.
A local crisis erupted as a fire broke out in a nearby theater. David rushed to the scene, using his sonic abilities to clear debris and safely guide people to escape.
As the week ended, David reflected on his new role as a superhero. He continued his day job enthusiastically, knowing he could make a bigger difference beyond just coaching vocals.

ending: Though his days were filled with music, David’s nights now held a new tune of heroism.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and sometimes, the most unusual talents can be the greatest gifts to humanity.
